Protein expression comparison tool between proteome datasets.

  • dataset1

    required

    dataset 1

  • dataset2

    required

    dataset 2

  • slice1

    slice name 1

  • slice2

    slice name 2

<togostanza-slice_comparison dataset1='DS1631_1 DS1631_2 DS1632_1 DS1632_3 DS1633_3' dataset2='DS1636_1 DS1637_2 DS1638_1' slice1='hoge' slice2='fuga'></togostanza-slice_comparison>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
